00031         template <class T>
00032                 class Singleton {
00033 
00034         public:
00040                 static T* instance();
00041 
00047                 static void release();
00048 
00049         protected:
00050                 static T* m_instance;
00051         };
00052 
00053         template <class T>
00054                 T* Singleton<T>::m_instance = NULL;
00055 
00056         template <class T>
00057                 T* Singleton<T>::instance() {
00058                 if(!m_instance) {
00059                         m_instance = new T();
00060                 }
00061                 return m_instance;
00062         }
00063 
00064         template <class T>
00065                 void Singleton<T>::release() {
00066                 if(m_instance) {
00067                         delete m_instance;
00068                         m_instance = NULL;
00069                 }
00070         }
00071 
00072 }
